org.agreement_technologies.common.map_planner

Interface IPlan

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HPlan, Plan
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    POPIncrementalPlan

    public interface IPlan
extends HPlan
    IPlan interface provides methods to work with incremental plans.
    Since:
    1.0
